entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump ABE is a true Leader, unlike you Trump, he acted on behalf of his country and the ppl. Your failed America and its ppl for 3 years, and really showed America your ignorance, ineptitude and incompetence with the Coronavirus. You needed to help each state, you didn't..VINDICTIVE.
